quest.name: A Subtle Inquiry
journal: Redolent Rose has a commission for you, as well as a private request.

Redolent Rose has tasked you with a commission for Kokomo, the object of Wawarukka's affections. Seeing an opportunity, he has also asked you to subtly inquire as to her feelings towards the miner. Speak with Kokomo at the Gold Court to learn more of the commission and of her heart.

Kokomo knows full well who Wawarukka is, and appears to harbor no ill will towards him. As for the commission, she has asked you to craft a pair of quality woolen tights. Prepare the item as requested and deliver it to Redolent Rose.

During the fitting, Kokomo unintentionally reveals that she has feelings for her secret admirer. Now knowing that Wawarukka's efforts will not be in vain, the guildmaster ponders how he can prevent Wawarukka from botching another attempt to win the young woman's heart.

※The next weaver quest will be available from Redolent Rose upon reaching level 45.
objectives: Deliver a pair of woolen tights to Redolent Rose.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, good of you to come. We have an opportunity to help that fool of a miner Wawarukka, but it will require some discretion.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: The guild has received another commission from Kokomo. That is to say, from her father, most likely.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Now, while I obviously expect you to craft her high-quality garments that meet our exceptionally high standards, there is one more thing I would have you do.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: When you meet with Kokomo at the Gold Court, I would have you subtly direct the conversation to the topic of Wawarukka. Try and discern what she thinks of the man.

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: Hello. I believe we met once before─Forename, was it? Thank you for coming. I'm sure you must be terribly busy with your many commissions.

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: ...Excuse me, did you say Wawarukka? He's one of your clients?

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: Ahahaha, what a coincidence! He visited the shop the other day! You should have seen Father's face when he chased him away─thankfully, he didn't recognize him. What ever possessed him to wear such a ridiculous outfit?

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: It's a shame, really. It feels like he hasn't visited in forever! I would have liked to have spoken with him...

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: Ahem, yes, the commission! I am in need of a pair of quality woolen tights. I should meet you at the guild for the fitting, correct? Then until we meet again, Forename.

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: I'm sure your tights will be excellent, but I know Master Rose would insist upon inspecting them first. I will wait here until he says that they are ready.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Have you the tights, Forename?

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Miss, if you would come with me...

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: They're so soft and warm...I don't think I've ever worn such comfortable tights.

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: This is just what I needed for all those evening parties Father makes me attend. The cold was becoming unbearable...

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: I could wear these tights underneath my gowns and Father would never be the wiser.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: I realize he expects a great deal of you, but could you not simply refuse to attend? Surely, you do not wish to devote your entire life to his business.

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: I appreciate your concern, Master Rose, but it's not possible. He's my father...

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: In that case, why not view it as an opportunity? Perhaps, some enchanted evening, you'll meet a charming young man.

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: Master Rose, don't be absurd! Wawarukka would never attend one of these dreadful parties!

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Ah, forgive me─I had no idea that you had already made the acquaintance of one such gentleman.

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: I...I... Th-Thank you for the leggings, Forename! I believe I must be going now!

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: As if Father would ever accept him...

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Well...at least we now know that Wawarukka's efforts were not in vain.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Now if only we could convince the buffoon to wear something relatively normal next time...
